Label: cubic hectometre
Definition: Volume unit. Conversion factor: 1m3 = 10^-6 hm3. Equivalent to a million cubic metre.

Label: cubic decametre
Definition: Volume unit. Conversion factor: 1m3 = 10^-3 dam3. Equivalent to a thousand cubic metre.

Label: thousand tonnes per year
Definition: Mass flow rate. Conversion factor: 1 kg/s = 31536 t/a. Used for loads or emissions of nutrients of oxygen consuming substances.

Label: becquerel
Definition: Radioactivity unit. SI unit.

Label: degree Celsius
Definition: Temperature unit. Expressed in degree Celsius.

Label: degree Kelvin
Definition: Temperature unit. SI base unit.

Label: Million Euro
Definition: Currency unit.

Label: siemens per metre
Definition: Electrical conductivity unit. SI unit.

Label: Colony Forming Unit
Definition: Colony Forming Unit.

Label: Colony Forming Unit per litre
Definition: Colony Forming Unit per liter.

Label: Colony Forming Unit per deciliter
Definition: Colony Forming Unit per deciliter.

Label: pH
Definition: pH unit.

Label: parts per million
Definition: Parts per million. Dimensionless quantity.

Label: parts per thousand
Definition: Parts per thousand. Dimensionless quantity.

Label: year
Definition: Time unit.

Label: day
Definition: Time unit.

Label: equivalent
Definition: Amount of substance unit. Expressed in equivalent, which equals the amount of substance in moles time the valence of the ion.

Label: equivalent per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in equivalent per litre, which equals the amount of substance in moles time the valence of the ion divided by the volume in litre.

Label: kilogram
Definition: Mass unit. SI base unit.

Label: kilogram per year
Definition: Mass flow rate. Conversion factor: 1 kg/s = 31536000 kg/a. Used for loads or emissions of hazardous substances.

Label: kilogram per cubic metre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. SI unit.

Label: kilogram per second
Definition: Mass flow rate. SI unit.

Label: kilometre
Definition: Length unit. Conversion factor: 1m=10^-3km

Label: square kilometre
Definition: Area unit. Conversion factor: 1m2=10^-6km2

Label: metre
Definition: Length unit. SI base unit.

Label: square metre
Definition: Area unit. SI unit.

Label: cubic metre
Definition: Volume unit. SI unit

Label: millisiemens per centimetre
Definition: Electrical conductivity unit. Conversion factor: 1 S/m = 10 mS/cm

Label: miliequivalent per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1eq/L=10^3meq/L

Label: milligram per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/m3 = 10^3 mg/L

Label: milligram per gram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^3 mg/g

Label: milligram per kilogram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^6 mg/kg

Label: milligram per cubic metre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/m3 = 10^-6 mg/m3

Label: milligram of Calcium Carbonate per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Calcium Carbonate per volume.

Label: milligram of Calcium per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Calcium per volume.

Label: milligram of Chlorine per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Chlorine per volume.

Label: milligram of Carbon per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Carbon per volume.

Label: milligram of Magnesium per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Magnesium per volume.

Label: milligram of Ammonia per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Ammonia per volume.

Label: milligram of Ammonium per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Ammonium per volume.  Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 1.2888 mg{NH4}/L

Label: milligram of Nitrite per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrite per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 3.2845 mg{NO2}/L

Label: milligram of Nitrate per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 4.4268 mg{NO3}/L

Label: milligram of Nitrogen per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrogen per volume.

Label: milligram of Oxygen per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Oxygen per volume.

Label: milligram of Phosphate per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{P}/L = 3.0662 mg{PO4}/L

Label: milligram of Phosphate per cubic meter
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{P}/m3 = 3.0662 mg{PO4}/m3

Label: milligram of Phosphorus per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphorus per volume.

Label: milligram of Phosphorus per cubic meter
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphorus per volume.

Label: milligram of Sulphate per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Sulphate per volume.

Label: milligram of Silicate per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Silicate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{Si}/L = 2.7090 mg{SiO3}/L

Label: milligram of Silicon per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Silicon per volume.

Label: milligram of Sulphur per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Sulfur per volume.

Label: millimole per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 mol/m3 = 1 mmol/L

Label: month
Definition: Time unit.

Label: mole
Definition: Amount of substance unit. SI base unit.

Label: mole per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 mol/m3 = 10^-3 mol/L

Label: mole per cubic metre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. SI unit.

Label: nanogram per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/m3 = 10^9 ug/L

Label: nanogram per gram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^9 ng/g

Label: nanogram per kilogram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^12 ng/kg

Label: percent
Definition: Percent. Dimensionless quantity.

Label: percent Oxygen saturation
Definition: Dissolved Oxygen percent saturation.

Label: second
Definition: Time unit. SI base unit.

Label: tonne per year
Definition: Mass flow rate. Conversion factor: 1 kg/s = 31560 t/a. Used for loads or emissions of nutrients of oxygen consuming substances.

Label: microsiemens per centimetre
Definition: Electrical conductivity unit. Conversion factor: 1 S/m = 10^4 uS/cm

Label: microsiemens per metre
Definition: Electrical conductivity unit. Conversion factor: 1 S/m = 10^6 uS/m

Label: microequivalent per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1eq/L=10^6ueq/L

Label: microgram per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/m3 = 10^6 ug/L

Label: microgram per gram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^6 ug/g

Label: microgram per kilogram
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^9 ug/kg

Label: microgram of Nitrogen per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrogen per volume.

Label: microgram of Phosphorus per litre
Definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphorus per volume.

Label: microgram TEQ per kilogram
Definition: Toxic equivalent (TEQ). Weighted mass ratio unit.

Label: micromole per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion factor: 1 mol/m3 = 10^3 umol/L

Label: micromole of Carbon per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Carbon per volume.

Label: micromole of Nitrogen per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Nitrogen per volume.

Label: micromole of Oxygen molecules per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Oxygen molecules per volume.

Label: micromole of Phosphorus per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Phosphorus per volume.

Label: micromole of Silicon per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Silicon per volume.

Label: micromole of Sulfur per litre
Definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Sulfur molecules per volume.

Label: Ecological Quality Ratio
Definition: Ecological quality ratio.

Label: Euro
Definition: Currency unit.

Label: Euro per year
Definition: Cost unit.

Label: Formazin Nephelometric Unit
Definition: Formazin Nephelometric Unit. See ISO 7027-1:2016.

Label: Nephelometric Turbidity Unit
Definition: Nephelometric turbidity unit. See http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/convert/units.html

Label: Practical Salinity Unit
Definition: Salinity unit. See http://unitsofmeasure.org/trac/ticket/27

Label: mass ratio
Definition: Mass ratio unit. Dimensionless: kg/kg

Label: molar ratio
Definition: Amount of substance ratio. Dimentionless: mol/mol

Label: presence or absence
Definition: Presence or absence of a given property.

Label: ratio
Definition: Ratio. Dimensionless quantity.
